trans-unit.source: Wraps an XSD <xref uid="langword_csharp_positiveInteger" name="positiveInteger" href=""></xref> type.
trans-unit.target: Esegue il wrapping di uno schema XSD <xref uid="langword_csharp_positiveInteger" name="positiveInteger" href=""> </xref> tipo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about XSD data types, see the "XML Data Types Reference" in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sui tipi di dati XSD, vedere "Riferimenti dei tipi di dati XML" in MSDN Library all'indirizzo [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapPositiveInteger"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapPositiveInteger"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapInteger"></xref> class with a <xref:System.Decimal> value.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapInteger"> </xref> classe con un <xref:System.Decimal>valore.</xref:System.Decimal>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Decimal> value to initialize the current instance.
Returns the XML Schema definition language (XSD) of the current SOAP type.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce il linguaggio XML Schema definition (XSD) del tipo SOAP corrente.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that indicates the XSD of the current SOAP type.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.String>che indica lo schema XSD di tipo SOAP corrente.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <xref:System.String> into a <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapPositiveInteger"></xref> object.
The <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> to convert.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""> </xref> da convertire.

trans-unit.source: A object that is obtained from value.
Gets or sets the numeric value of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il valore numerico dell'istanza corrente.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Decimal> indicating the numeric value of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Decimal>che indica il valore numerico dell'istanza corrente.</xref:System.Decimal>

trans-unit.source: Gets the XML Schema definition language (XSD) of the current SOAP type.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il linguaggio XML Schema definition (XSD) del tipo SOAP corrente.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that indicates the XSD of the current SOAP type.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.String>che indica lo schema XSD di tipo SOAP corrente.</xref:System.String>
